did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Correspondence Relating to Arizona State Flag, 1926-1927
did.abstract: Correspondence, chiefly a letter from Charles W. Harris, Adjuntant General, giving the history of the design and adoption of Arizona's state flag. Also includes form letters from Gov. George W. P. Hunt, Secretary of State J. W. Kerby, a letter from James McClintock, a broadside, and a newspaper clipping relating to the flag's history.
